thread.title: High school players go crazy as LeBron James walks onto court after their game
thread.title_full: High school players go crazy as LeBron James walks onto court after their game

author: Sara Harris (sharris@sportingnews.com)
title: High school players go crazy as LeBron James walks onto court after their game
text:
Updated at 11:39  39 a.m. ET 
Wednesday was a special day for two high school basketball teams, who got to play against each other at Quicken Loans Arena. 
The two two teams, Cleveland Central Catholic and Garfield Heights, finishedÂ a few hours before the Cavaliers took on theÂ Timberwolves. 
Cleveland Central Catholic won the gameÂ with a thrilling buzzer-beater, but that wasn't the only exciting moment of their day. 
The players absolutely lost their minds when LeBron James suddenly walked out onto the court. 
WARNING: Video contains profanity. tfw you finish playing your H.S. game @TheQArena & then someone walks on to get pregame shots up ... and it's @KingJames . đą #ThisIsWhyWePlay pic.twitter.com/Ca8GnzwdhO
